what else can i ask urgency can take how manydiff values

Thought for a couple of seconds

Looked at Code
Looked at Code

Right now urgency accepts three literal strings:

Value Prompt effect inside the model
"low" mild excuse, no pressure
"medium" normal believable excuse
"panic" urgent, dramatic excuse

(FastAPI will still let you send any string—but if it isn't one of those three the prompt won't reflect the intended tone.)

If you'd like more granularity

Add one of these common scales:

1. Four-level scale: "low", "medium", "high", "panic"
Prompt tweak: map each to a tone clause (e.g. “escalate urgency, keep under 30 words” for "high").

2. Numeric 0-1 float: urgency: float = @.5
Pass it directly to the prompt: L
“Urgency level (0-1): 0.75 — adjust tone and brevity according,,.
